title: New Snowdown Showdown Champs
body: I think we need a Holly & Ivy Zyra. You can even have her plants as Christmas trees throwing presents, baubles or tinsel.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Screamer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=kZYW2e7f,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-30T00:04:52.530+0000)
>
> I think we need a Holly & Ivy Zyra. You can even have her plants as Christmas trees throwing presents, baubles or tinsel.

How about it?
